description: Take a break. You cannot take transit or progress on challenges for 30 minutes. If on transit, get off when you planned to.
name: Take a Break

description: Do not progress until you buy something you have seen in an advertisement.
name: Gullible Tourist

description: one member of the opposing team must find and consume a 12oz alcoholic drink on one knee.
name: Get Iceâ€™d

description: destroy a canton; its effects are all nullified and no team may control it.
name: Bomb

description: View the other teamâ€™s hand. Choose 1 card and make them discard it immediately.
name: Pick a Card, Any Card!

description: The cursed team must roll two D6 any time they want to use a door. They must roll a 6 or higher to enter any door for an hour. You can retry any roll after 15 minutes.
name: Curse of the Jammed Door

description: Both members of the opposing team must change their phoneâ€™s language to one of Switzerlandâ€™s non-english languages for 4 hours.
name: Duolinguist

description: You cannot complete any challenges or activate power-ups until you take a picture of four unique Swiss flags.
name: 2ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡­2

description: Change all clocks to the same random time for both people for the rest of the day.
name: Right Twice a Day

description: If you are on transit, get off immediately.
name: Get Me Off

description: You cannot use any form of money until you have pet a dog.
name: On a Leash

description: You cannot progress towards challenges or use public transit until you acquire a flower.
name: Stop and Smell the Roses

description: You cannot leave your current location until you have written a limerick about your current location.
name: Curse of the Tortured Artist

description: You cannot progress towards challenges or use public transit until you buy something from a vending machine.
name: So Many Options

description: The other team loses half of their money
name: Robber Baron

description: The other team must listen to the entire Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes album by Jimmy Buffet
name: Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes

description: Before taking any other transit, visit a town that is one stop in any direction
name: Just One More Stop

description: Create and Hang a Poster
name: Curse of the Public Service Annoucement

description: Take a shot.
name: Shoot Your Shot

description: Eat a bag of carrots by the end of the day. Must be played with at least 3 hours left in the day.
name: Curse of the Vegetarian

description: Go to the nearest Indian Restaurant and order something at the highest spice level.
name: Can't Take the Heat
